name: Space Raiders (itch)
description:
You play as a little guy who's trying to protect the heart of his home planet. Farm wood and iron to keep the fire alive and craft ammo so you can fight against the wild creatures in the night. Are you preapared?

*UPDATE*

Version 1.3 Hardmode is now live!

- Made with GameMaker Studio 2

- Made for Ludum Dare 38 in 72 hours.

- All of the coding and the art is made by me. The sounds are some from me, some from others.

Have fun!
